channel.title: RivalryPK - The Founding of Somthing Spectacular
channel.description:
[img]http://rivalrypk.com/forums/images/MyRed/logo.png[/img]
[url=http://www.rivalrypk.com/][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/281rpc.jpg[/img][/url] ' [B][SIZE=5][color=black]Server info[/color][/SIZE]
[b]RivarlyPk Never Ending Pking
Ever Wanted A New Server? No Ugly Customs?
Well Join RivarlyPk, Endless Hours Of Nonstop Action, Fun, Events And More.
RivarlyPk, Has Much To Offer, Such As Amazing Features, Like Prestige Master, You Can Prestiage Number Of Times, To Claim Get
Rewards & Race To The Top To Prestige 10 Ten Before AnyOne Else. Another Great Feature We Have, Is F2P Minigame, Bringing The
Players A Save Minigame To Kill Other Players & Redeem Points To Spend In The Store For Numerous Rewards.! We Have 5+
Minigames, Fully Working To Get Players Some Good Weapon & Armor To Go Into The World, Of Bossing & Pking! We Always Bring To
You To Best Drop System In All Of Rsps.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uda1S8i.png[/img]
[color=black][size=4]RivarlyPk Is A New Server,[/size][/color]
We Have A Active Owner, Always Listening To Players Ideas & Trying To Make Them Happen As Soon As Possible. We Are A 24/7 Eco/Pk
Server Looking To Give The Players What They Want, Uniqueness Is The Key To RivarlyPk. We Have Amazing Staff & Players Always
Ready To Help Players & New Players With What Ever They Need. We Have Active IPB Forums. & Much More?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IQLG4zU.png[/img]
[size=4][color=black]Bosses:[/color][/size]
We Have Numerous Number Of Bosses To Kill To Obtain Amazing Armor To Pk In Or Just To Fight Other Bosses With, Such A Few
Member Bosses For People That Donate They Can Have Some Special Things To Do(: We Have Bosses Such As, Kalphite Queen, Kbd,
StrykeWorms, Corporal Beast, Avatar Of Destruction, Balance Elemental & More.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tfhqK8a.png[/img]
[size=4][color=black]Skilling:[/color][/size]
We Have 21 Amazing Working Skills, All Can Be Done. Amazing Exp Rates, So It Don't Take 4 Months To Max, While You Skilling We Also
Bring To You Skilling Points, Every-time You Level Up A Skill You Get 10 Skill Points, & You Can Spend In The Skilling Point Shop For
Amazing Rewards & Skilling Items & Clothes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oFjWYlL.png[/img]
[size=4][color=black]Annihilation Points:[/color][/size]
Annihilation Points, The Owner Woofdawg23, added These To Make Pvm & Bossing Much Better & Worth It, Let Alone Just Leveling And
Getting Drops From The Bosses, You Can Get Points Every-time You Kill A Npc, Lower Level Npcs Give Less Points & Higher Npcs Give More
Points. You Can Spend These In Are 3 Shops, The Owner Has Made For Us(:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1DsF1NR.png[/img]
[size=4][color=black]Loyality Points:[/color][/size]
Ever Wanted To Be Active & Be Rewarded For It? Well Every 30 minutes You Spend On RivarlyPk You Get 100 Points(: They can be Spent
In Our Great Shops To Claim Amazing Weapons & Armor. Such As D Claws, & Chaotics.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/f1KSSBV.png?1?6509[/img]
We Have Alot More Being Added By The Day I
Hope You Guys You Mind Coming To Check Us Out & Maybe Staying On This Great Brand New Server(:[/b]
[size=4]Thanks i hope you join your community :), Owner Woofdawg23[/size]
[/B]
[url=http://www.rivalrypk.com/][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/281rpc.jpg[/img][/url]
